purpose: The email announces an extension of deadlines for the Call for Papers for the ICTAC 2025 conference, which will take place in Marrakech, Morocco. It provides details about the conference's focus on theoretical aspects of computing, including various topics of interest. The email also lists important dates for abstract and paper submissions, as well as information about invited speakers and publication opportunities.

conf_name_candidates.raw: International Colloquium on Theoretical Aspects of Computing
conf_name_candidates.evidence: International Colloquium on Theoretical Aspects of Computing

evidence_sentences: International Colloquium on Theoretical Aspects of Computing

The ICTAC conference series aims at bringing together researchers and practitioners from academia, industry, and government to present research and exchange ideas and experiences within theoretical aspects of computing through (formal) methods and tools for system development.

Topics of Interest: The conference concerns all aspects of theoretical computer science, including, but not limited to: Formal languages and automata, Semantics of programming languages, Logic in computer science, etc.
Deadlines: July, 03rd: Abstracts (extended), July, 09th: Full papers (extended), August, 30th: Notification, September, 15th: Camera-ready papers.
